channel.title: Python on Shan Data Scientist to be!

item.title: Pip install guide[Mini-Post]
item.description: I will get back to the SQL posts but thought I would post something that could be useful to others. If you want to use Python for Data Science you will need additional python libraries. I don’t have a huge understanding of command line functions and I found it a bit difficult to find a step by step guide on how to install python libraries . My wife(the doctor) thought that PIP was something else medical related from a scandal a few years ago.
